tool_description: In linguistics, morphology is the study of words, how they are formed, and their relationship to other words in the same language.
name: Morphology
title: Morphology

api_list.name: morph
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://morphology.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/morph"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "morphology.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://morphology.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/morph"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "morphology.p.rapidapi.com"

print(response.json())
